channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Taiwan Lawmakers Propose New Law To Protect Over 1 Million ‘New Immigrants’
item.description: Lawmakers in Taiwan are seeking to establish a new law to protect the rights and interests of immigrants as the number of new residents and their children in the country has surpas

item.title: 5 People Prosecuted Over Building Collapse in Taipei City
item.description: Five people are facing charges over a botched construction project that collapsed several nearby buildings in Taiwan's capital, Taipei.

item.title: Taiwanese Medical Staff Walk Out, Demand Higher Wages
item.description: Medical staff at one hospital in southern Taiwan's Chiayi City held a protest after stalled negotiations for a raise.

item.title: Taiwan Rejects China’s Bid To Host Whampoa Academy's 100th Anniversary
item.description: Taipei has rejected Beijing’s bid to host a commemorative event for the 100th anniversary of the Whampoa Military Academy. Established by the Republic of China military in 1924, th
